data.name: Haron: The Riverside
data.detailed_description:
HARON: The Riverside is an action RPG adventure with a top view and an exciting plot. Our team tries to combine intense battles, exploration and a mysterious atmosphere, creating one of the most atmospheric game worlds.
Embark on a journey through many different locations of the post-Soviet space. Non-linear levels and a well-developed storyline are waiting for you. Beware of anomalous zones and experience the oppressive atmosphere of forests, the danger of abandoned villages, harsh winter locations.
The storyline of HARON: The Riverside, inspired by the series of S.T.I.K.S. books and the best post-apocalypse games, will tell the story of incredible adventures in a parallel post-Soviet space.

Features

* An incredible journey. Your path will pass through a variety of locations with many traps, anomalies and dangerous creatures in search of a mysterious guide.
* Survival in a dangerous world. A fascinating story connects the classic gameplay with open locations.
* A beautiful but hostile world. Explore a world brought to life by dynamic weather and cycles of day and night.
* Intense battles and abnormal phenomena. Collect valuable resources from monsters and anomalies, buy more powerful weapons, upgrade your arsenal and engage in battle with humans and mutants.
* The story depends on your actions. The decisions you make will have consequences.
* Full immersion in the atmosphere. Atmospheric music, howling mutants, the noise of the forest and the crackling of the fire - HARON: The Riverside will captivate and scare you like no other game.

data.short_description: Explore the Riverside world, where dangerous enemies, mysterious anomalous phenomena and amazing artifacts await you. Make your own way in this unique story, make friends and defeat enemies. Choose your path and find a way out, because it will determine your fate in the end.

English, German, Russian*
